title: Leave Buster's just being a real **** u know?
body:
haven't left any games or afk'd for so long, many weeks,and many games have past, AND FOR SOME REASON LEAVE BUSTER DECIDES TO LOW PRIORITY QUE ME FOR AFK'ING 1 GAME, ONE BLOODY GAME! WHAT THE HELL MAN! and it wasn't even my fault to begin with... sigh* I just wanted to play league {{item:3073}} 

I just wish it could somehow understand tht IT WAS A ONE TIME THING! y punish me for afk'ing 1 game out of the blue, it's already been so many GAMES since my last low priority que. BLOODY HELL!
